mmmmmm
we're professionals.

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Dec-2013
item.description:
Today's show takes a look back at our favourite music of 2013, featuring a whole bunch of cool bands we like!
Plus! Jake and Robin's radio drama is especially underprepared this week! Exciting stuff.
item.itunes:subtitle: New Years Favourites

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Dec-2013
item.description: Today's episode was dramatically shortened due to early morning bus difficulties and SNOW! We played Christmas music, had a pretend fight, and our radio drama featured Chase Randall and The Case of the Escaping Reindeer. Merry Christmas from Robin and Jake!xqedjlk,lk,j (that was JAke)
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas Spectacular!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Dec-2013
item.description:
Great People, Great tunes, Great Googlimoogily!
Today's high femcon sonic adventure takes us on a journey through sound! Just listen. Stop reading - start listening.
Today's radio drama: Chase Randall and the case of the burning Christmas Tree! Chase Randall and Scarlet do their best as things heat up in the Old Speakeasy! Will they solve the case? What happens next? Where are they going? Why are you still reading - this is a radio show not a novel.
item.itunes:subtitle: First Glimpse of Christmas Spectacular!

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Dec-2013
item.description: On today's show, Robin and Jake offer the listeners advice on how to perform a successful handshake, play some music, and perform a hit-and-miss edition of their yet-to-be-named radio crime drama noir, where Scarlet's former husband who doesn't love her anymore may or may not have stolen her prized jewels. Tune in!
item.itunes:subtitle: Handshake Lessons **

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Nov-2013
item.description:
Wow, what a great show! Ticket Giveaway AND part two of our radio-noir crime drama! What sort of trouble are detective Chase Randall and the mysterious Scarlet getting themselves into! How will they get out of this one?
we also played Renny Wilson and a Leonard Cohen song. And other ones.
this is goofy - lets just submit it already.
-kisses - love Robin and Jake
item.itunes:subtitle: THE BEST SHOW WE'VE EVER DONE ULTIMATE FOREVER!! (just kidding, but it was pretty good)

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Nov-2013 Up On The Roof
item.description:
This week included the first segment of our original Radio Crime Noir Drama: Detective Chase Randall is introduced to the mysterious young actress Scarlet, who informs him of a MURDER!
we also played indie music.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Robin and Jake
